Description.Text: Bosphorus Palace is an elegant 5-star hotel offering well-presented rooms and high quality facilities, on the waterfront of Beylerbeyi. Highlights include a restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi. The hotel benefits from a picturesque location along the Bosphorus river, in the upscale neighbourhood of Beylerbeyi. Attractions include Beylerbeyi Palace, the Beylerbeyi art gallery and several historic pavilions that line the waterfront. The hotel is housed in a 19th-century building, with Neo-Ottoman architecture. The property boasts a small garden. Inside, the hotel showcases a blend of period and contemporary decorations and furniture. There are no leisure facilities onsite, but free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The restaurant serves international cuisine and the bar offers a range of alcoholic and soft beverages. Standard rooms are located on the top floor of the hotel and have a cosy decor incorporating wooden floors and neutral colours. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite/cable TV and a safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower and a bathrobe. Free parking is possible onsite.
